attributes.action: Stop discriminating and/or allowing disrimination of white lower working class people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Employment and CRB checks:

Do we need CRB or similar? Yes, but ONLY sex offenses, crimes against vulnerable people and repetitive violence should be considered, all else should remain private and considered spent under the rehabilitation of offenders act, especially if the subject applicant has remained law abiding for a number of years.

Lower working class white males in particular suffer from discrimination from many areas as a result of mistakes they made while they were young, but because of serious lack of support it was inevitable they would make such mistakes, you, the government did nothing.

To enable a fair system CRB should only provide details to companies and local council's if:

There is past evidence they could be a risk to children.

There is past evidence they could pose risk to the vulnerable.

They have a record of repeat offenses of violence.

They have a record of murder, manslaughter or grievous bodily harm.
